thread.title: How to never overpay for travel again
thread.title_full: How to never overpay for travel again

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: How to never overpay for travel again
text:
It pains us when we buy something then see the price drop. That never has to happen again when you pay for travel.
Savings expert Matt Granite reveals three free sites that will rebook airfares, hotel stays and car rentals for you at the lowest rate and pay you back the difference.
Follow @MattGranite for more money saving tips.
Matt Granite is a consumer reporter with WKYC in Cleveland. His videos offer tips to consumers on how to save money.
We do not get any financial compensation for mentioning any of these deals or companies. The only purpose of this segment is to save you money.
SAVE OF THE WEEK Make $1,300 next time you get bumped on a flight | 02:04 Is your flight full and the airline bumping passengers? You may want to jump on that! Deal expert Matt Granite explains your rights as a passenger and how much money you can earn by working the system. WKYC-TV
1 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK 5 items to never buy in bulk | 01:24 If you're one of the many Americans who shops at wholesale stores, beware! Here are five things you should never buy in bulk. VPC
2 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Looking for cheap flights? The best time to buy is ... | 01:25 After years of hearing that booking flights on Tuesday morning will get you the cheapest flights, money expert Matt Granite says that isn't true anymore. Watch the video for his advice on when to book. VPC
3 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK The top five worst things to buy online | 02:09 Money expert Matt Granite explores what items are best purchased online and what items are better left to the in-store shopping experience.
4 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK 5 brands you should never pay full price for | 01:25 Forget trekking through the mall or scouring the web for deals. Consumer savings expert Matt Granite shows you the top 5 items you should never buy at full price. WKRE-TV
5 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK The best data plan deals for your smartphone | 01:56 Deal expert Matt Granite reveals which service providers offer the most features and least hidden fees for smartphone users. VPC
6 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK How to find out when your favorite things go on sale | 01:48 These sites will actually alert you when prices drop on your favorite things. VPC
7 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK The best TV streaming service for your viewing pleasure | 02:04 Savings guru Matt Granite explains which television streaming service might be right for you and your enterainment budget. VPC
8 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK The top 7 things you should never buy generic | 01:40 While shopping in the grocery store, you may wonder whether or not the generic option is the better buy. Money expert Matt Granite has his list of the top things you should and shouldn't buy generic. VPC
9 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK How to get the most car for your cash | 01:40 You could save thousands of dollars on your next car purchase just by knowing what to ask for, and when to lease or buy. VPC
10 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Airbnb, VRBO: Sorting through vacation rental alphabet | 01:46 Travelers have more options than ever for places to stay on vacation. Money expert Matt Granite helps you figure out which vacation rental companies are worth your time and money. VPC
11 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Free airline upgrades are possible with these tips | 01:44 Matt Granite explains what scenarios could score a seat upgrade on your next flight. VPC
12 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Stop wasting money going organic on these veggies | 01:35 Organic produce is more expensive than the non-organic options, but is it better or healthier? For some fruits and vegetables, spending money on the organic option is a waste of money. VPC
13 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Groupon vs. LivingSocial: Which deal site is best? | 01:45 There are countless daily deal sites, but in money expert Matt Granite's opinion, it comes down to only two - Groupon or LivingSocial. Which of those sites offer the best discounts? VPC
14 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Flight overbooked? Tips to avoid being bumped | 01:39 You know the airline's pleas all too well, that the flight you're on is overbooked and they need volunteers to bump to a different flight. Here are some tips to avoiding being bumped on your next full flight. VPC
15 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Cable or satellite TV: Which is cheaper? | 02:03 If you're not willing to cut the cord just yet, you may be wondering if cable or satellite is the better option when it comes to your television-subscribing options.
16 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Everything you need to know about Uber | 01:31 Whether you travel a lot or want to control you next cab from the palm of your hand, Uber is a transportation service controlled by you. VPC
17 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Walmart or Target: Who has the lowest prices? | 01:41 Money expert Matt Granite compares the prices of Target and Walmart to decide which retail giant saves you the most money. VPC
18 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK How to get free Wi-Fi on your next flight | 01:47 For some of us, the worst thing surrounding a flight is our disconnect from email, the internet, and the modern world. Money expert Matt Granite tells us how to get free or almost free Wi-Fi during flights. VPC
19 of 20 SAVE OF THE WEEK Score free hotel upgrades with these three tips | 01:23 Whether you're a frequent flyer or traveling with your family and need to book a hotel room, use these three tips to better your chances for a free hotel room upgrade. VPC
